## Grid2ItemProps type

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Represents the props that can be passed to a MUI Grid2 item components used for the layout of the subcomponents of combined country code selector component.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Grid2ItemProps = Partial<Omit<Grid2Props, 'spacing' | 'rowSpacing' | 'columnSpacing'>>;
```
